Nautical HVAC Site

My agency didn’t offer branding, so I have lots of experience making sub-par logos shine. Charter, on the other hand had a fresh rebrand, which helped me tell their story.

Nautical HVAC Site

My agency didn’t offer branding, so I have lots of experience making sub-par logos shine. Charter, on the other hand had a fresh rebrand, which helped me tell their story.

Team

  • SEO Specialist
  • Writer
  • Developer
  • PM

What I did

  • Design
  • Style guide
  • Some headlines

Date

  • 2020
  • 1 week

Situation

A client was going through a name change and needed a website. They came to us with a new logo and a brochure. We had a video call where I learned how far they wanted to lean into the theme. Turns out; pretty far. Their main concern was easing their loyal customers into the new brand.

Solution

I riffed on the brochure and logo to create a style guide full of assets to use across other marketing, including a custom brand for their maintenance plan.

Animations

One thing that would make it better is professional photography. Stock photos can only do so much to build trust.

“Even the previous website company saw and said how awesome the website was.”

Client

Impact

Design system lives on for other projecys, like print:



And posts for social:

See The Site

Thanks for being here.

“And for you just being you” - FR
